DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: MEDEIROS, I. P.;DE MEDEIROS, IVO PAIXAO;PAIXAO DE MEDEIROS, IVO;MEDEIROS, IVO P.

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: I am on going applied computing doctorate candidate at National Institute for Space Research (INPE); MSc. in Eletronics and Computer Engineering by Brazilian Aeronautics Institute of Technology (ITA) and Computer Engineer by Federal University of Par. Currently, I have been developing decision support system for aviation business; before that, I worked at Flight Safety Dept. developing flight data analysis and statistics. I also have been working as collaborator research at IEAv-DCTA on autonomous navigation and artificial intelligence. The areas I have interest are: big data analytics, machine learning, prognostics and health monitoring, reliability, autonomous navigation, natural language processing and embedded systems.

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES: In my doctorate, I have been studying application of artificial intelligence and operations research to Integrated Vehicle Health Management. During my MSc. formation course I had been working on autonomous navigation, specifically on mobile robotics simultaneous localization and mapping problem, as a scholarship student of PRO-Engenharias Program. When I was undergraduate in Computer Engineering Course I developed intelligent system such as fuzzy, neuro fuzzy, neural networks, expert system to applications like liquid temperature control, servomotor speed and position control, Part-of-speech tagging (Natural Language Processing) and industrial plants diagnosis. Those works were developed thanks to the support of institution like SESu/MEC, CNPq and VALE.

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Iniciao cientfica no LABEAD (Laboratrio de Ensino Distncia) - CCNT (Centro de Cincia Naturais e da Terra) da Universidade Federal do Par, onde trabalhei com processamento de linguagem natural, em especial etiquetagem de palavras.
VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-INGLES: Undergraduate research mentorship at LABEAD (Distance Learning Lab) - ICEN (Exact and Natural Science Institute) at Federal University of Par. There, I had been working on natural language processing, specially part-of-speech tagging.
